           alt="Car Detailing"

Index: =================================================================== --- +++ @@ -0,0 +1,43 @@ +import { motion, useViewportScroll, useTransform } from "framer-motion"; +import Image from "next/image"; + +export default function Hero() { + const { scrollY } = useViewportScroll(); + const titleY = useTransform(scrollY, [0, 300], [0, -50]); + const subtitleY = useTransform(scrollY, [0, 300], [0, -30]); + const buttonY = useTransform(scrollY, [0, 300], [0, -20]); + const bgY = useTransform(scrollY, [0, 500], [0, -50]); + + return ( +
+ {/* Background */} + + + + + {/* Hero content */} +
+ + Wash Labs + + + + Mobile Car Detailing. Premium Service at Your Doorstep. + + + + Book Now + +
+
+ ); +}
